en.21BI_NAME: The 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art Kanazawa
en.21BI_DESCRIPTION: The 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art Kanazawa (Kanazawa 12) is a museum of contemporary art in Hirosaka, Kanazawa City, Ishikawa Prefecture. The nickname is Marubi-don (the origin is "round art museum") , but generally it is often called "21 beauty". The 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art Kanazawa (Kanazawa 12) is a museum of contemporary art in Hirosaka, Kanazawa City, Ishikawa Prefecture. The nickname is Marubi-don (the origin is "round art museum")

ja.CATCH_COPY: そうだ 金沢、行こう。
ja.21BI_DESCRIPTION: 石川県金沢市広坂にある現代美術館です。一般に「21美」と呼ばれています。愛称は「まるびぃ」です。(どっちやねん)
